WYSIWYM.model
Class SummationAnchor

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Anchor
      WYSIWYM.model.SummationAnchor

public class SummationAnchor
extends Anchor

SummationAnchor signals that a sequence of >3 edges have been summarised in a list. If the user clicks this anchor, all edges are displayed separately.

Version:
1.4 01-10-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
